mapper.insert: insert into service (service_kind, service_desc, service_price, service_tet, service_state, service_createAT, admin_id) VALUES (#{service_kind}, #{service_desc}, #{service_price}, #{service_tet}, 1, now(), 1)
mapper.select: select id, service_kind, service_desc, service_price, service_tet, service_state, service_createAT, admin_id from service where service_state = 1
